revised_title: Discovery of a New Substance in Urine and Its Relation to Mollities Ossium
tldr: Henry Bence Jones discovers a new substance in the urine of a patient with Mollities Ossium, which is the hydrated deutoxide of albumen. The substance is soluble in water and is precipitated by nitric acid. The author also mentions a letter from William A. Norton about new findings in terrestrial magnetism.
